features: ✅【Soft Skin Friendly Material】Our 8x10 area rug is made of durable polyester low pile fiber, when you close your eyes and lie on the soft and comfortable low pile rug, you will fall in love with the soft touch of the rugs 8x10 ! This bedroom rug is great for kids and pets, pet dander and hair won't get trapped inside, preventing pets and kids from chewing or scratching. Our living room rugs are certified environmentally friendly, so you can feel confident in furnishing your family with a cozy area rug！

✅【Traditional & Retro Style Design】These washable rugs are exclusively and carefully designed by yicriahn. Our boho rugs are very different from the common patterns on the market. The gorgeous medallion print pattern on the surface presents a longer sense of history, adding a touch of luxury to your living space. Perfectly matched with your home style, whether it is the living room, office, nursery and other high-traffic areas. Our vintage rug will be an ideal addition to your home decoration!

✅【Safety Non-Slip Backing】 Our bedroom rug is designed to bring safety to your living space! The rugs for living room come with a high-density non-slip rubber dot backing that ensures enhanced friction, effectively stabilizing its position and preventing dangerous movement and slipping. Our rugs for bedroom are designed with seniors, children, and pets in mind, providing a safe, non-slip environment for everyone!

✅【Easy to Clean & Machine Washable 】Our boho rugs are designed with a low pile surface, which is very easy to clean and maintain, you don't need to spend much time or money on maintenance, just use a dry rag or vacuum cleaner to do it for daily cleaning, you can also put this area rug in the washing machine for a deep clean, and after drying, you will have a new living room rug! We aim to help you get rid of busy housework and enjoy a relaxed and easy lifestyle!

✅【Durable & Non-shedding Seams】Our living room rugs are carefully crafted with precision stitching and are not easy to fall off and fade. Are you still worried about gifts? This bedroom rug is your answer. This large area rug will be the perfect gift for family and friends for Christmas, Thanksgiving, and birthdays! If you have any questions, please email us in time and we will provide you with a satisfactory solution within 12 hours!

✅【UseTips】The washable rug 8x10 may have temporary creases when it arrives, please don't worry, the creases will disappear within a few days, you can use a heavy object to press on the carpet and use a low-temperature iron to iron it. Note: Do not use bleach when cleaning restaurant vintage rugs!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our Brand Story yicriahn is a company integrating design, production, and sales. We have more than 40 years of expertise in rug making. We aim to provide users with high-quality products and services. We collect and listen to users' voices, and we have an excellent team of designers, who design truly practical and comfortable area rugs. We adhere to the highest craftsmanship and material standards to ensure the durability and comfort of your living room rugs. yicriahn aims to make your life easier and better, and create a warm and comfortable home for you!

Why Choose yicriahn Area Rugs? ----1. Soft and Skin-friendly Material: Our rugs for the living room are made of high-quality polyester fiber, soft and comfortable to the touch. ----2. Child and Pet Friendly: Our machine washable rug contains no harmful substances and is perfect for homes with children or pets. ----3. Vintage Style Design: This bedroom rug easily matches any interior style. ----4. Exclusive and Elaborate Design: There are gorgeous and exquisite printed patterns on the surface, which cleverly combine traditional and modern -----sophistication. ----5. Anti-slip Backing: The living room rug is equipped with high-density anti-slip rubber dot backing to prevent dangerous movement and slipping. ----6. Easy to Clean & Stain Resistant: You can clean the area rugs in minutes with a dry rag and vacuum cleaner, or you can use your washing machine for a deep clean. ----7. Not Easy to Fall Off and Fade: The rugs for bedroom are carefully crafted with precision stitching. ----8. Widely Uses: This washable rug is perfect for your living room, bedroom, dining room, home office, nursery, and even various other places. ----9. Safety and Security: All our carpets are environmentally certified. ----10. Premium Help: We provide professional help to resolve all your doubts and questions.

How to Remove Carpet Creases? Step 1: Use heavy objects Place something heavy, such as a book, plant, or pottery, over the large area rug to help flatten the creases. Step 2: Flip the boho rug Roll the living room rug in the opposite direction from where it was originally placed. This simple action helps flatten your carpet quickly. Step 3: Steam or heat treatment If your rugs for the living room won't straighten naturally, consider using steam or a hair dryer to heat them. This will help encourage the fibers to relax and settle, making the creases disappear more easily.

Use Suggestions: Please note that the color of these rugs may vary slightly due to subtle differences in environmental and lighting factors such as wall color, floor color, surrounding furniture, and lighting. Because area rugs are folded and packed in shipping, your living room rug may arrive with temporary creases. But please don't worry, these creases will fade away gradually.

We know that carpets are not just simple home decorations, but also an attitude towards life. Therefore, we are not only committed to providing excellent quality products and services, but also focusing on presenting modern and classic designs to meet your diverse life needs. Choosing our vintage rugs not only adds comfort to your living space, but also creates a convenient and warm home experience for you. Hurry and add these rugs to your shopping cart to start the journey of creating a warm and comfortable home and sharing happy moments with your family!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Blend of Style and Functionality - A 5-Star Area Rug!
reviews.reviewText: I recently adorned my living space with the Area Rugs 5x7, and I must say, it has exceeded all my expectations! This machine-washable soft living room rug combines style and functionality seamlessly, making it the ideal addition to any home. From its vintage design to its non-slip backing and stain-resistant properties, this rug has transformed my space into a cozy and inviting oasis.**Vintage Charm (5/5):** The standout feature of this area rug is its vintage-inspired design, which adds a touch of charm and character to any room. The intricate patterns and rich brown tones create a warm and inviting atmosphere, while the distressed finish lends a timeless appeal that complements a variety of decor styles, from traditional to contemporary.**Soft and Comfortable (5/5):** Crafted from high-quality materials, this rug is incredibly soft and comfortable underfoot. The plush pile provides a luxurious feel, making it perfect for lounging and relaxation. Whether I'm barefoot or wearing socks, I can't help but sink my toes into the soft fibers every time I step onto the rug. It truly adds an extra layer of comfort and coziness to my living space.**Functional Design (5/5):** In addition to its stylish appearance, this area rug boasts a range of functional features that make it a practical choice for everyday use. The non-slip backing ensures that the rug stays securely in place, even in high-traffic areas. Plus, its stain-resistant properties make it easy to clean and maintain, perfect for households with pets or children. And the fact that it's machine washable is a game-changer, saving me time and effort when it comes to cleaning.**Versatile Placement (5/5):** The 5x7 size of this area rug makes it incredibly versatile, allowing me to use it in a variety of rooms throughout my home. Whether placed in the living room, bedroom, dining room, nursery, or home office, the rug adds warmth and style to any space. Its large size creates a cohesive look and helps anchor the room, while its neutral color palette ensures that it blends seamlessly with existing decor.**Overall Impression (5/5):** In summary, the Area Rugs 5x7 is a 5-star addition to any home. Its vintage charm, soft and comfortable feel, functional design, and versatile placement options make it a standout choice for enhancing the look and feel of any room. Whether you're looking to add warmth to your living space or revamp your home decor, this rug is sure to impress with its style and functionality. Five stars without hesitation!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful but thin and rough
reviews.reviewText: This area rug is colorful and quite attractive. I really like the design and intricate pattern. I think it would look good on a wall as an art piece. I don't like it as much on the floor, as it's not that comfortable to walk or sit on. This area rug is very thin and has virtually no padding. There is a rubberized backing material to control slipping, but it's also very thin and almost unnoticeable. Because the rug is so thin and lightweight, it doesn't pass my robot vacuum test. The robot is always lifting the corners and edges, requiring some manual re-adjustment after cleaning. I'm sure that a powerful hand vacuum would be difficult to use on this rug near the edges. The rug arrived folded, and after a few weeks it still shows many creases. I'm sure they will eventually go away over time, and after the creases are gone I'll need to use some carpet tape to hold the edges down.Overall, I really like the look of this rug. It's just not very soft and comfortable if you plan to sit or walk on it with bare feet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Perfect Blend of Style and Functionality
reviews.reviewText: The Area Rugs 5x7 in Blue/Beige are a fantastic addition to any home, seamlessly blending style with functionality.The color combination of Blue/Beige brings an elegant touch to the living space, with a vintage design that effortlessly complements various decor styles. The 5x7 size is perfect for creating a cozy and inviting atmosphere in any room.A standout feature is the machine washability, offering unparalleled convenience for cleaning. Tossing these rugs into the washing machine results in a fresh and clean look every time. This feature is particularly beneficial for high-traffic areas like the living room.The non-slip backing provides a secure grip on the floor, preventing accidental slips or falls. This is especially valuable for households with kids or pets, adding an extra layer of safety to the home.Additionally, these rugs are non-shedding and stain-resistant, maintaining their pristine appearance even in the face of spills. The ease of wiping away any stains makes these rugs a practical choice for areas prone to accidents.The softness of the rug is a testament to the quality of materials used. It feels luxurious underfoot, creating a comfortable and inviting space in the bedroom, dining room, nursery, or home office.In summary, the Area Rugs 5x7 in Blue/Beige surpass expectations in both beauty and practicality. Whether you're aiming to enhance the style and comfort of your living space, these rugs are a highly recommended investment for anyone seeking a quality addition to their home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I Like This “Distressed” Rug! It’s Comfortable and Stable to Walk on
reviews.reviewText: I’ll just repeat the title: “I like this ‘Distressed’ Rug! It’s comfortable and stable to walk on.” Right now I have it on a laminate floor that I slide on when walking on it with my socks. I dislike that! Now that I have the rug there I do longer slide, and miracle of miracles, the rug doesn’t slide either. I put it on the floor and then pulled on it to rearrange where it was. It moved, but I had to pull on it. The back doesn’t feel sticky to my hand, but it does lay snugly on the floor.I like old things, and while this rug isn’t old, it looks old (except for the edge bindings – they’re perfect). I also like how the edges don’t curl up. I have another area rug that when I walk over it I often catch the edge of the rug with my foot and pull it up. I guess I don’t lift my feet much. This rug is thinner than that one, but I’ve still caught it and yet the edge doesn’t curl up, it just flops back down. Nice!I ordered the 5’ by 7’ version, and it’s plenty big. I like the patterns on the rug (it’s the Blue/Beige version). There’s not much more to say, so I’ll stop here!
